name: Truist Financial Corporation
description: Truist Financial Corporation is one of the largest financial services holding companies in the United States, formed from the merger of SunTrust Banks and BB&T in December 2019. Headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Truist offers a wide range of financial solutions including retail and commercial banking, investment services, mortgage banking, and wealth management. The company's mission is to inspire and build better lives and communities by delivering innovative financial solutions that meet the evolving needs of its diverse customer base. Truist aims to create a superior banking experience through a commitment to technology and customer service, focusing on personal relationships and community engagement. With a presence in 17 states and Washington, D.C., Truist serves millions of customers through its extensive branch network and digital platforms. The company is dedicated to corporate social responsibility, actively investing in community development and sustainability initiatives, and is recognized for its efforts in promoting diversity and inclusion within the workplace and the communities it serves.
